data.text: @ImaWakin I wish they would pay for it themselves it’s not like they can’t afford it. Stop taking tax payers money your all billionaires

The racism, Russian entanglements, pedos, mistresses, lawsuit losses, backstabbing, classism, disloyalty etc they should keep their heads down. Chuck n hoe are the end

@Colro208 I agree! AND let's not forget that royals & royalists believe that kings & queens rule by DIVINE RIGHT gifted directly from god. This translates into them being superior & 'closer to god' than the rest of us.

@ImaWakin The Queen signed Parliamentary papers for 70yrs as a mascot of medieval feudalism. What is there really to celebrate? History is an enjoyable study! But why does this modern(?) thinking society hang-on to the need to fully fund daily re-enactments of an irrelevant past?
@Thequeensburner LOL! The Queen will be on the balcony wearing blue and yellow! https://t.co/V3PcxEIktZ
